title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.9 - Cutouts and similar devices prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.9 - Cutouts and similar devices prohibited

State Regulations

No operator of any vehicle shall use any cutout or other
apparatus or device which shall allow the exhaust gas to escape into the
atmosphere without passing through a muffler or silencer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1023.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
